attributes.action: Stop Excessive car park charges at Glasgow Royal Infirmary!
attributes.additional_details: The cost of parking at Glasgow Royal have rocketed. Nursing staff who work 13 shifts a month (12hrs) now have to pay £89.50! or Monthly permit of £112.50. We are exempt from the Scottish Government of capping as the carpark was built using PFI. Help us stop this daylight robbery to all staff in Glasgow Royal Infirmary by allowing a capped rate to be applied.
